quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're looking at your phone. Remember to look up and experience the world.
Help people. Be interested. Make a difference. Live passionately. Go comando.
quotes.author: Crystal Woods

quotes.quote: Life may take you to where you least expect it, but have faith that you are exactly where you need to be.
The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Live the moment.
Life is so short. Focus on all that matters to you, and let go of everything that doesn't.
But only he who, himself enlightened, is not afraid of shadows.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes open to your mercies. The man who forgets to be thankful has fallen asleep in life.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Never plan to make this world your permanent abode, for it is temporal for all, rather permanent your ideas & purpose here.
Courage is the drive to do what you want.
In my lifeâ€¦ I've lived, I've loved, I've lost, I've missed, I've hurt, I've trusted, I've made mistakes... But most of all, I have learned.
Know what you want to do, hold the thought firmly, and do every day what should be done, and every sunset will see you that much nearer the goal.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: In the arena of life, so many lessons are taught but few are taken and few are applied.
Your life is like a piece of paper, you can waste it or write something beautiful on it.
Life will never be the same once you begin again, and that's a truly beautiful thought.
Dreamers Can.
You only live once, but if you're healthy, you'll live it as long as possible.
Every step on your journey has been divinely chosen and is necessary. Just keep doing your best.
Don't doubt yourself, that's what haters are for.
When you come from a place of creation and not reaction, you're going to be making your life as opposed to responding to your life in a negative way.
quotes.author: Lewis Howes

quotes.quote: Sometimes I feel that life has passed me by... Do you ever feel that way, Charlie Brown?""I feel that it has knocked me down and walked all over me!
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Even the most positive person can have a negative day. It doesn't change who you are.
Someday, you'll be telling your grandchildren about today. Make sure you have a good story to tell them.
Learning to fly means taking a leap of faith.
College inspired me to think differently. It's like no other time in your life.
I believe that everything happens for a reason.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Uncertainty breeds change.
Insanity: Doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Life is tough but so are you.
Challenges and obstacles are a part of life. They make us stronger and build character. If life were easy it would be boring and you would never grow.
Embrace being perfectly imperfect. Learn from your mistakes and forgive yourself, you'll be happier.
quotes.author: Roy Bennett

quotes.quote: In order to discover who you are within, you need to attune your visionary world deep in your sub-conscience to the outward world and live it.
Believe it or not, a normal human being is one who can have an orgasm and is adjusted to his society.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Life is one big gym where we need to constantly workout to stay fit for this world. And indeed love here is the treadmill.
If you're in a relationship and find yourself constantly using 'we' instead of 'I' - stop. You are more than your relationship.
Life is more meaningful when our goal is fulfillment rather than gratification.
Pain is a signal that you need to find a solution to a problem.
quotes.author: Ray Dalio

quotes.quote: There are so many good things happening in your life right now, even on the days you don't see them.
For the grateful, there is no room for disappointment, each moment offers life.
When you try to do something big it's hard to fail completely.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: Life works better when we go with the flow rather than fight the current.
Life's a gloomy puddle, until you start jumping in it.
If you want a comfortable life, make more money. If you want a happy life, make more memories.
Keep looking up... That's the secret of life.
Sometimes you feel lost, sometimes you feel found. Both are part of living.
You always drop by, to enlighten my mind, when my wings are feeling heavy & I've forgotten how to fly.
Love is life, and if you miss love, you miss life.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Change the world by being yourself.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Learn to enjoy the way as much as you would enjoy when you reach the destination.
You fall, get up, make mistakes, learn from them, be human and be you.
quotes.author: Priyanka Chopra

quotes.quote: Life, although it may only be an accumulation of anguish, is dear to me, and I will defend it.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quotes.quote: Here today, may be gone tomorrow! Never take anyone or nothing for granted! Be sure to count your blessing daily because tomorrow isn't promised.
Every so often our life leads us to a new door, don't leave it closed.
The less you complicate your life, the happier you'll be. Slow down, get outside, watch a sunset, and enjoy the simple pleasures of your day.
Each night before you fall asleep, give thanks for your blessings. The Universe will reward your gratitude with ever-greater abundance.
Contribute to a cause larger than yourself.
The best moments in life come from feeling, not from thinking.
How you deal with stress is how you deal with life.
